Game

Class RandomEventCards

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.RandomEventCards
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    bsJohnsonEventCard, DragonEventCard, DungeonEventCard, ExplosionEventCard, FireEventCard, FloodEventCard, FogEventCard, mMurdersEventCard, RiotEventCard, SubsidenceEventCard, TrollsEventCard

    public abstract class RandomEventCards
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    nav_k

    Represenation of Random Event Cards

    Contains Random Cards in enum data structure and a method that
    returns a Random Event Card whenever it is called i.e. for
    the purpose of distributing cards
